Location of septic tank results in unpleasant odours around the playground area. Likely cause is that the concrete cover of the septic pit has been compromised due to either poor quality of the original construction, or weathering.

Casting a new covering slab is a short term fix to the problem. If undertaken this should be combined with a more general overhaul of the school's toilets, including adjusting the gradient of the black water pipe coming from the latrines.
